sentence: Room was very nice newly refurbished
Spacy and freshly decorated Rooms but should ask renovated one

The room was clean and just renovated location was the best just few steps from central station and one road cross to the shopping area Gym and pool closes at 6 pm it was not convinient cor us as we go all day out and everything closes there early so the iny thing we ciuld do is gym and pool byt sad they close it at 6 pm even before we arrive the hotel
Definitely time to renovate this venue
Update room décor and heat the pool
A nice renovated hotel with some quirks
Great if you ask for the refurbished rooms and want to stay in the middle of town
Room was clean and lobby was quite modern with a nice bar restaurant but the hallways could use an update to reflect the clean and modern rooms and lobby
The other half of our party – in the “ new wing ” had a very updated room slate tile bathroom with gleaming walk in shower white and grey colour scheme throughout
Lovely renovated room larger than the last one soothing modern colours
You have to change the pillows and the mattress and also to renovate the bathroom ASAP
Hotel is undergoing renovation
Rooms are being renovated so I was in one of the older ones but the bed was very comfotable

disappointing as it was expensive and not worth the cost the location is good convenient for the station the shops and the harbourthe hotel is undergoing gradual renovation and we were allocated an unrenovated room with a poor quality bathroom not reflected in the photos posted
Overall everything was up to standard as usual only one minor thing is that the staff told us the renovation is ongoing 9 am to 6 pm daily
They told us the room has been refurbished lately
Besides the excellent location the breakfast was great and the gym and pool were also greatTthe floor we stayed at had a lot at rooms that were being renovated and the noise was quite disturbing
Renovations happening during our stay
The bathrooms are small but clean and updated comfortable to use
you had think that after reconstruction that Radison would know how to design a good layout
shower facilities at pool could use some upgrading old worn down checking in and out took too long with more than 25 people queing and only two people at the desk
The Pool area really needs a renovation the pictures of this area weren‘t accurate and there were many children playing and jumping into the really small Pool
The amenities were a bit spotty but this might have been due to some renovations onsite
Renovated and although the material choices are not of an exclusive kind it feels more cozy in their new scrap
The swimming pool facility needs updating
Must have remodeled from my last visit
Only minor but perhaps the pool area needs updating
